Package com.github.tadukoo.view.paint.gradient

Interface Gradient

All Superinterfaces:
SizablePaint
All Known Implementing Classes:
GradientUIResource, LinearGradient, RadialGradient
public interface Gradient
extends SizablePaint
Gradient is used to make it easier to create generic Gradient paints, as a SizablePaint.
Since:
Alpha v.0.2
Version:
Alpha v.0.2.1
Author:
Logan Ferree (Tadukoo)
